name: English Vocabulary Matching
description:
Draw a line to match each of the pictures on the left side of the page to the english letter on the right side or vice versa.

Features :
- 14 Colors and Ability to add more
- Bright, colorful, child-friendly design
- All pronunciation by professional voice-over
- Completely with 40 levels different for your kids to enjoy.
- Age-appropriate vocabulary and the ways each letter can sound in a word.

- NO SOUND?
If the sound isn't working, make sure the mute switch is turned off, activate the application, then turn up the volume and the sound will work.

We always strive to provide high quality assets. If you have enjoyed with Alphabet Matching , we would be happy if you would spend few minutes and write a review for us on the Store.

Enjoy watching your kids get more and more confident at english vocabulary matching game while having loads of fun on the way!
